titleStmt.title: A serious and faithfull representation of the judgements of ministers of the gospell within the province of London. Contained in a letter from them to the generall and his councell of warre. / Delivered to his Excellency by some of the subscribers, Jan. 18, 1648.
titleStmt.author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: by M.B. for Samuel Gellibrand, and Ralph Smith.,

notesStmt.note: "Imprimatur Ian. 18. 1648. James Cranford," p. 1 at end.
Title witihin border of printer's ornaments.
Signed at end: Your servants in the Lord, Thomas Gataker, Pastor of Rotherhith, et. al.
Reproduction of original in: University of London. Library.
